typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	yearfilter as integer (1989),
	genrefilter as string ('Comedy')
}
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(MovieID = toInteger(byName('movie')),
		MovieTitle = byName('title'),
		MovieYearReleased = toInteger(byName('year')),
		MovieRating = toInteger(byName('Rating')),
		MovieGenres = split(toString(byName('genres')),'|')) ~> BuildModel
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(MovieYearReleased,
		MoviePrimaryGenre),
	AverageRating = round(avg(MovieRating),2)) ~> Aggregate1
BuildModel derive(MoviePrimaryGenre = MovieGenres[1]) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(MovieYearReleased == $yearfilter && MoviePrimaryGenre == $genrefilter) ~> Filter1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		each(patternMatch(`Movie`))
	)) ~> sink1
